_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Good Morning Skiers and Riders! This is Caitlin with your 5 am snow report for Tuesday, January 13th. Remember the easiest way to get up to date information is on the Ikon Pass app or website. 
Our Mid mountain base is 31 inches, the temperature is 29 degrees, the winds are 5 miles per hour from the SW, with Partly Cloudy skies.
The Summit base is 47 inches, the temperature is 21 degrees, the winds 17 miles per hour from the WSW, with Partly Cloudy skies.
The base temperature is 14 degrees. 
We will be skiing and riding on 19 lifts, 122 runs, and 1,707 acres on Packed Powder. 
Ready to win a boatload? Enter Steamboats Boatload Sweepstakes for chances to score gear all season longand one legendary Steamboat getaway. Head to steamboat.com/events for details on how to enter and win. 
Stay in the know with the Ikon Pass App. Find it in the app store on your mobile device and get lift and trail statuses, conditions updates, and more.  
If you are thinking of exploring outside the ski area boundaries, and dont know exactly where you are going, dont go.  
Ski and Ride with Care and we will see you on the mountain!
